overview: playwright: 22 tools; browser_navigate -> Navigate to URL, browser_click -> Click element (double/right/modifiers supported), browser_type -> Type text into element with optional submit, browser_snapshot -> Get page snapshot for element refs (use before actions), browser_take_screenshot -> Screenshot page or element (png/jpeg), browser_fill_form -> Fill multiple form fields at once, browser_select_option -> Select dropdown option by value, browser_hover -> Hover over element, browser_drag -> Drag and drop between elements, browser_press_key -> Press keyboard key (ArrowLeft, Enter, etc), browser_evaluate -> Run JavaScript on page or element, browser_run_code -> Execute Playwright code snippet, browser_console_messages -> Get console logs (filter errors optional), browser_network_requests -> List network requests since page load, browser_tabs -> Manage tabs (list/new/close/select), browser_wait_for -> Wait for text/element or timeout, browser_resize -> Resize browser window, browser_handle_dialog -> Accept or dismiss dialog, browser_file_upload -> Upload files to input, browser_navigate_back -> Go back in history, browser_close -> Close current page, browser_install -> Install browser if missing
